price: ‹ ߊߟߊ߫ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߒߠߋ ߦߴߊߟߎ ߟߋ߫ ߝߍ߬ ߒ ߕߟߏ߫ ߓߍ߫ ߒ ߢߊ ߘߌ߫
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
